statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_markers;
SELECT marker_name, chromosome, position FROM genetic_markers WHERE allele_frequency > 0.5;
SELECT marker_id, marker_name FROM genetic_markers ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT chromosome FROM genetic_markers;
SELECT marker_name, allele1, allele2 FROM genetic_markers WHERE chromosome='X' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers WHERE chromosome = 'X' ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT marker_name, allele1, allele2 FROM genetic_markers WHERE allele_frequency > 0.5;
SELECT DISTINCT chromosome FROM genetic_markers ORDER BY chromosome, position;
SELECT marker_name, allele_frequency FROM genetic_markers WHERE allele_frequency IS NOT NULL ORDER BY allele_frequency DESC, marker_name ASC;
SELECT marker_id, allele1, allele2 FROM genetic_markers WHERE position BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY allele1, allele2, marker_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticMarkers;
SELECT marker_name, chromosome FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE position = 1000;
SELECT population_name, country, sample_size FROM PopulationData WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT marker_name, chromosome, position FROM GeneticMarkers ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT marker_name, chromosome, position FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE marker_name LIKE '%abc%';
SELECT marker_id, marker_name, chromosome, position FROM GeneticMarkers;
SELECT marker_id, chromosome, marker_name, position FROM GeneticMarkers ORDER BY marker_id DESC;
SELECT population_name, sample_size, country FROM PopulationData WHERE country='USA' AND sample_size > 1000;
SELECT marker_id, marker_name, chromosome, position FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE chromosome='X' ORDER BY position ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticMarkers JOIN PopulationData ON GeneticMarkers.marker_id = PopulationData.marker_id WHERE PopulationData.sample_size < 5000;
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers;
SELECT marker_name, chromosome FROM genetic_markers ORDER BY marker_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sample_population WHERE country='USA';
SELECT population_name, country, region FROM sample_population WHERE region='North';
SELECT marker_id, allele_1, allele_2 FROM marker_data ORDER BY marker_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sample_population;
SELECT sample_id, population_name, country FROM sample_population ORDER BY country DESC, population_name ASC;
SELECT marker_id, marker_name, chromosome, position FROM genetic_markers WHERE chromosome='X';
SELECT sample_id, population_name, region FROM sample_population WHERE region IS NOT NULL;

SELECT m.marker_id, m.marker_name, md.allele_1, md.allele_2, md.allele_frequency FROM genetic_markers m JOIN marker_data md ON m.marker_id = md.marker_id WHERE md.allele_frequency > 0.5 ORDER BY md.allele_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticMarkers;
SELECT id, marker_name, chromosome_number FROM GeneticMarkers ORDER BY chromosome_number DESC;
SELECT marker_name, position FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE chromosome_number = 2;
SELECT id, marker_name, allele_1, allele_2 FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE position > 100 ORDER BY position ASC;
SELECT population_name, sample_name, collection_date FROM SamplePopulation JOIN PopulationSamples ON SamplePopulation.id = PopulationSamples.population_id ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticMarkers;
SELECT marker_name, chromosome_number, position FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE chromosome_number = 2;
SELECT allele_1, allele_2 FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE position BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT marker_name, variant_name, allele_frequency FROM GeneticMarkers JOIN MarkerVariants ON GeneticMarkers.id = MarkerVariants.marker_id;
SELECT population_name, sample_name, collection_date FROM SamplePopulation JOIN PopulationSamples ON SamplePopulation.id = PopulationSamples.population_id;
SELECT * FROM GeneticMarkers
SELECT population_name, sample_size, collection_date FROM PopulationSamples
SELECT study_title, researcher_name, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchStudies
SELECT marker_id, marker_name, chromosome, position FROM GeneticMarkers
SELECT population_name, collection_date, marker_id FROM PopulationSamples
SELECT * FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE chromosome='X';
SELECT marker_name, position FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE position > 1000 ORDER BY position DESC;

SELECT PopulationSamples.sample_id, PopulationSamples.population_name, ResearchStudies.study_title FROM PopulationSamples JOIN StudySamples ON PopulationSamples.sample_id = StudySamples.sample_id JOIN ResearchStudies ON StudySamples.study_id = ResearchStudies.study_id WHERE ResearchStudies.researcher_name='John Smith';
SELECT DISTINCT marker_name, chromosome FROM GeneticMarkers ORDER BY marker_name;
SELECT marker_id, allele_1, allele_2 FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE allele_1='A' OR allele_2='T';
